definition: to speak evasively (idiom); beating about the bush

to dodge/to duck out of the way/to beat it/shaken (by a fall)/to sprain/to pull a muscle/lightning/spark/a flash/to flash (across one's mind)/to leave behind/(Internet slang) (of a display of affection) "dazzlingly" saccharine
surname Shan
bright/luminous
his/her/its/their/that/such/it (refers to sth preceding it)
old variant of 詞|词[ci2]
word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]

sentences.english: They really waffled on that question.
sentences.chinese: 他们确实对那个问题闪烁其词。

sentences.english: She gave me a dubious reply when I asked why she came back so late.
sentences.chinese: 我问她为什么回来这么晚，她回答得闪烁其词。

sentences.english: Instead, focus on your flight response – the instinct to avoid your partner.
sentences.chinese: 相反，应关注你对伴侣闪烁其词的本能反应。

sentences.english: We talked about two hours, but he hedged over my questions.
sentences.chinese: 我们谈了近两个小时，但他对我的问题始终闪烁其词。
他对那个问题闪烁其词。

sentences.english: On her future, Palin was just as ambiguous.
sentences.chinese: 佩林对自己的未来闪烁其词。

definition: to equivocate/to talk evasively (idiom)
to hem and haw/to stall/to stammer/to mumble/to falter
to evade/to dodge (out of the way)
(idiom) to sidestep the question/to answer evasively
to deny flatly
to mention sth without elaborating (idiom); not giving details
(idiom) reluctant to speak about it/tight-lipped
(idiom) to talk in a roundabout way to cover up the truth/evasive
to refuse to say anything about (idiom)/to remain tight-lipped/to avoid mentioning
to avoid the important and dwell on the trivial/to keep silent about major charges while admitting minor ones
lips sealed and not saying anything (idiom); fig. to omit mention (of a non-person or embarrassing topic)/to censor
lit. to reply "don't know" whatever the question (idiom)/fig. absolutely no idea of what's going on/complete ignorance
the king looked left and right and then talked of other things/to digress from the topic of discussion (idiom)
pinyin: wang2 gu4 zuo3 you4 er2 yan2 ta1

definition: to muddle through/to fob sb off/to beat around the bush/to dodge
(of speech) obscure/unclear/(of actions) vague/ineffectual
to hum and haw (idiom); to mumble as if hiding sth/to speak and break off, then start again/to hold sth back
